page.title: 12Recreation
page.content: From our questionnaire it appears that many more people have non-sporting hobbies as opposed to sporting hobbies. This is probably because there are more old people living in the area than young people. There were 17 different sporting hobbies mentioned, the most popular being swimming followed by cricket and tennis. There were 75 non-sporting hobbies listed of which gardening was the most popular, followed by walking. We were surprised that very few people listed watching television as a hobby.
